hero.description: Hi, I'm Krisztian Kiss. A passionate Front-end React Developer based in Budapest, Hungary.

about.subtitle: About Me
about.title: A dedicated Front-end Developer based in Budapest, Hungary
about.description: As a Front-End Developer with a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I specialize in creating dynamic and responsive websites. My skill set includes proficiency in React, Tailwind, and Redux, enabling me to create and maintain interfaces that provide a seamless user experience. I am adept at writing clean code, using the latest tools and techniques to craft engaging web applications. While my primary focus is front-end development, I am also experienced in building full-stack applications using technologies such as Express, MongoDB, and Node.js. I thrive in collaborative environments and enjoy working with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional web solutions.
